comment:
I am definitely a fan of Southern Tier Mokah.  After looking at this recipe.  It does not match what is written on the bottle.
Southern Tier Brewing has raised the standard for creating a wonderful Imperial Mokah which we all should strive to duplicate. Rated 99. 
A Stout Brewed with Chocolate and Coffee. 
ABV 11.2
2-row barley
caramel malt
black malt
barley flakes
Jamaican roasted coffee
bittersweet Belgian chocolate
kettle hops: columbus & chinook
